snippet: Larry McMurtry auctioned some 300,000 used books from his bookstores in Archer City, Tex.
abstract: Lonesome Dove author Larry McMurtry auctions some 300,000 used books from his Booked Up bookstores in Archer City, Tex; McMurtry, the country's highest-profile book dealer, has decided to shrink his sprawling enterprise of four to one single store, which will remain open with an inventory of about 150,000 books.
lead_paragraph: Larry McMurtry auctioned some 300,000 used books from his bookstores in Archer City, Tex.

headline.seo: Larry McMurtry’s Book Auction in Texas
headline.main: Wanted, Dead or Alive: Used Books
